_comment: Conservative risk limits for first week of live trading

daily_limits.comment: VERY conservative for Week 1. Increase after proven success.

position_limits.comment: Start with 5% max per position, 40% max deployed, 60% cash

trade_limits.comment: Manually approve any trade >$2K for first week

drawdown_limits.comment: Halt if portfolio drops 10% from peak or below $18K

consecutive_loss_limits.comment: Stop if 3 losses in a row or 2 losing days in a row

allowed_actions.comment: Week 1: Only allow simple BUY/SELL. No shorting yet.

time_restrictions.comment: Avoid first 15 min (high volatility) and last 30 min (close)

week_2.comment: After 5 successful days, can loosen slightly
